page.title: 06North Warwicks. Golf Course
page.content: The North Warwickshire{Golf Course}is situated off the B 4102 or the"Meriden Mile"as it is sometimes called. It has a car park big enough for over 20 cars with reserved spaces for the Captains, the Secretary and the President. The car park also overlooks the Golf Course. The Course itself is a nine hole course in a natural setting of trees,bushes and a stream. It also has a practice tee with a net and a putting course by the{Clubhouse.}The Clubhouse has got toilets,snooker room and a bar. It has also got lockers for {members}and a golf shop where you can purchase equipment. There are 201 male full members,65 restricted members,74 lady members,16 junior members and 15 social members. Most members come from around the local area but there are some exceptions for example there is a member who lives in Cornwall.
